duties_responsibilities.duty: Observing rules governing privileged communications and confidential information.
Answering incoming calls from members while delivering quality service, creating a positive caller experience; verifying information and following any applicable scripts.
Assisting members with instructions on uploading traffic citation for processing.

Entering citation, member, and court contact information in Time Matters, creating appropriate tasks in Time Matters, determining appropriate plea, and drafting corresponding representation letter, assigning case to attorney.
Generating and saving documents in matter files in NetDocs.
Overnight, emailing, or faxing urgent documents with Outlook and FedEx Overnight Service.
Amending court information in Time Matters.
Contacting courts prior to due date to confirm receipt of representation letter.
Preparing motions for the production of evidence.
Creating or amending court date information for attorneys and paralegals.
Explaining deferral process to members via phone.
Adhering to firm standards of courtesy and professionalism.
Assisting with other related duties as negotiated to meet the ongoing needs of the organization.
